content.full_text:
Certification of the Election of Abraham Lincoln to the Illinois General Assembly,

28 August 18381
paragraphs: Certification of the Election of Abraham Lincoln to the Illinois General Assembly,
citations: Theodore C. Pease, ed.,Illinois Election Returns, 1818-1848, vol. 18 ofCollections of the Illinois State Historical Library(Springfield: Illinois State Historical Library, 1923), 321.

footnotes.text:
1Charles R. Matheny wrote the body of this certification  and docketing on the reverse
                  side.
